overview:
Omnipro Technologies is a highly result oriented & rapidly growing strategic software services provider with a burning intent to be the best in the industry, offering comprehensive range of software consulting & technology solutions to the business world.

We offer a spectrum of services to a wide range of industry needs by leveraging on our domain expertise & strategic alliances with leading technology providers. We specialize in creating strategically designed, efficiently developed & effectively deployed software solutions which would enable our customers to focus on their core area & work with no constraining boundaries of workspace.

We deliver solutions that go beyond meeting customer expectations.

For more information, Please visit our website: www.omniprotech.com
